description:
The Inland Lake Trail is located 12 kilometers north of Powell River on the Sunshine Coast.  The trail circles Inland Lake and is fully wheelchair accessible, making it one of the few such trails in Canada.  Small rustic cabins are located on the route at the 2 overnight camping areas and the trail also includes 8 picnic areas and 6 fishing piers.  The trail is ideal for day or overnight trips and is an easy hike for all levels of hiker.  

For more information contact the Powell River Visitor Infocentre at 1-877-817-8669 toll free or 604-485-4701.
title: Inland Lake Trail
